title: The Geist is Right 4/23: ICP, Elizabeth Warren, Elijah Wood, NFL Draft
itunes:title: The Geist is Right 4/23: ICP, Elizabeth Warren, Elijah Wood, NFL Draft
description:
On this edition of The Geist is Right Jack and Miles discuss the Insane Clown Posse have cancelled this year's Gathering, Elizabeth Warren has lost her oldest brother to COVID-19, Elijah Wood showed up to a random stranger's island in Animal Crossing to sell turnips, and the NFL Draft is happening and how much Jack and Miles care is very little!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
